item.title: Organisational Culture Matters a Whole Lot - Francis Lynch
item.description:
Organisational Culture Matters a Whole Lot - Francis Lynch

Download the Transcript - 0rganisational Culture matters a lot Organisational culture matters a lot. why does this organisation matter? When people join an organisation, there's usually some reason why they want to be there. Sometimes it's just a job, but often it's about connecting to the purpose of the organisation or the values of the organisation.
